สนุกจ้า

--- Update ---

Despite the emblem system not being perfect, for both killers and survivors, the game is in a much better place and (mostly) enjoyable...

However, the emblems do not punish killers who camp enough. Games where you are the 1/4 (25%) to be caught first, get hooked, and then camped and tunneled to death is un-interactive, and not fun.

Most games you don't get this, but unfortunately their are too many where this does happen.

Games still have unfair match-making too, where a new player may be put alongside prestige players, against a average leveled killer. The math balances out, but it makes the game un-fun for the new player, and un-fun for the killer to try and get the more experienced players.

With a new game by the devs coming out soon, it won't surprise me if this one gets less developments, and matchmaking issues (and camping) are still not fixed due to this new game taking development time.

Only get this on a sale (50% or more), don't pay full price for this.

--- Previous review (6th September 2016)

I enjoy this game greatly, I like most of the character mechanics and perks...

What I don't like is trying a different character (who is at level 1) and being put with other survivors mostly at level 10-20, against a killer at level 40...

I don't know whether the issue is with a lack of player base, or lack of a background system to queue people around the same level, but the game was changed recently so that rather than leaving a lobby if you felt other players were too high level, instead it doesnt show you their level now.

I've played as killer a few times at level 5, and been against level 30 players, or level 35 prestige 2 players...

The game isn't designed for people who can only play an hour or two a day, and it is a shame.
Maybe if there was a non-competitive mode? (turns off perks) the game could be viable for new players, but with the current systems, it is unplayable. (additionally the lobbying issues and various other visual/connectivity bugs help to take away from the immersion and experience)

If this game came at full retail of £30+ I'd tell you to stay away from it. However the price is very reasonable for the amount of hours I've put into this game. The game is constantly improving and new content is being added. Yes there are always issues, the Devs are reletively new but are hard at work. I've spent £40 on games and barely played 50 hours so it's certainly value for money.

The typical game spawns you in as a Survivor where you need to repair 5 Generators to power the doors and and make it out alive. It's easier said than done as each Killer has different mechanics and is a human player constantly looking to sacrifice you to The Entity by hooking you. There's plenty of longetivty to the game as long as you don't mind a bit of a grind. You can unlock character specific perks for both Killer and Survivor.

If you're looking for a triple A quality game this is not your game, this is a fairly priced Indie game. If you enjoy Cat vs Mouse gameplay and nailbiting close calls then this game is worth the money

Update: 660+ Hours at the time of writing this review. The game has its ups and downs but the game is certainly fun and for an affordable price. DLC Cosmetics are low price and the game is stricly NOT Pay-To-Win. All DLC Perks content can be obtained without buying the DLC. Frequent updates and new content with this game means you can't really go wrong. I just advise a thick skin as some of the community are unpleasant to deal with.

Прошло более 2 лет с выхода игры и пришло время рассмотреть ,что же вышло по итогу.
Первым делом хочу отметить задумку игры ,нас закрывают на одной карте с маньяком и наша задача выжить и сбежать,задачей же маньяка является остановить нас.И  какие же могут возникнуть проблемы спросите вы.
В игре порядко 25 карт,которые по сути не отличаются друг от друга(авторы штампуют их одну за другой) и казалось бы должно подкреплять атмосферу безысходности,но нет.
Во вторых в игре только один режим игры и абсолютное отсутствие контента.Да авторы добавляют каждые 3 месяца новую главу,но много ли в ней пользы,все выжившие абсолютно одинаковы,у них нет никаких особенностей ,а что касается маньяков ,каждый из них индивидуален и ведет охоту по своему,что и  является сильной стороной игры.
В игре есть своя ранговая система,но она не на что не влияет.
В третьих  у всех персонажей есть так называемые "перки",которые даруют им необычные способности.Именно перки уничтожают игру и атмосферу происходящего.
В завершении хочу обратить внимание на технические проблемы.Авторы категорически не хотят давать игрокам нормальные сервера,хостом всегда является маньяк,пинг которого может посеять такой хаос ,что сразу ливать хочется.
Большое количество загрузок,действительно большое,они отнимают 10% времени.

Dead by daylight- это когда...
-выживший дисконектится прямо у тебя на плечах( личный опыт)
-ты обнаруживаешь что все тимейты вылители, ты чинишь 2 генератора, находишь люк и сваливаешь, попутно прихватив фиолетовый ключ (личный опыт)
-спилили все крюки но у тебя 3 iron grasp тебе по@уй... а у выжившего 3 осколок, ему тоже по@уй! (личный опыт)
-завели все генераторы, открыли все ворота, спилили все крюки, ты никого не поймал... через 5 минут 3- е выживших висят в подвале ( личный опыт: Майкл Майерс повесил все таки одного под конец игры, и пока трое пытались его спасти, нафармил на них третью стадию- фарш готов).
-тимейты смотрят на твою смерть!(личный опыт)
-ты смотришь на смерть тимейтов!(неличный опыт)
-всю команду принесли в жертву, ты остался один, нашел люк, а после игры подружился с маньяком. (личный опыт)
-смерть это выход, когда у тебя больше 10К очков

Devs have made bad decision after bad decision with seemingly no end.
Every update I hope they learn from their mistakes but they never do.
I simply cannot reccomend this game.
Killer has always been a stressful role as the time is constantly against you and there's not much you can do to stop it if the survivors are competent.
The skill ceiling is small, the game simply isn't fun to me.

Quality assurance doesn't seem to have been tested on recent and reletively older updates, very game breaking "features" and bugs, so every update seems like a mystery box as to if they have made the game horrible for the next week or so.

Update 13/06/2020: They've improved their ability to review their updates prior to pushing stuff out resulting is less critical blunders on new updates.

Ich bin gespannt was es noch so alles bringt und kann das Spiel nur empfehlen! :)

It took a while for this game to find its place but eventually it did, I thought this game had a buggy start untill I got Friday 13th, I learned just how terrible a launch could be. 

What sets this game apart is the balancing, Where as friday the 13th is set to "Realism" where fanboys would claim "the killer is not OP, thats how he is supposed to be." Dead by daylight actually has balance where killer and survivors can win depending on tactics, Friday 13th is heavily balanced towards the killer as the killer is given teleport, infared view (highlights anyone near him) and warp (where the killer can move 4X the speed of any survivor.

If you're looking for a fun survival horror game with ur friend, this is the go to game. Even solo gameplay is pretty decent as survivor. Overall I'd say this is my comfort game when im absolutely bored out of my mind or wanna mess around with friends. Also gets loads of good content pretty regularly so you don't get bored of the game that easily. 

Overall a solid 8/10 from me!

Dead by Daylight ist, wie ich finde eine gut durchdachtes Spiel. Es bietet ein ausgewogene Balance zwischen den Überlebenden und den Killern, WENN man nicht als Überlebender gegen einen Killer spielt der 2 oder mehr Perks hat. Dann wird es anstrengend, vorrausgesetzt man hat selber 1 oder kein Perk. Weil dann kann es je nach Skills des Killers, auch mal zu Frustration kommen.

Aber dazu kann ich sagen, einfach dran bleiben.

Mit einer Spielzeit zwischen 10 - 20 Minuten pro Match ist es auch gut für zwischendurch geeignet. Mir ging es allerdings so, dass wenn ich erstmal eine Runde gespielt habe auch noch eine weitere spielen musste.

Von mir eine definitve Empfehlung für das Spiel.

Für einen Einblick: (Hier Klicken) 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdl3pV4gB4iC6ZmLiS7c1E1Qr16jz1QT

The Good
-Buggs getting cleaned out every month.
-Strange players that just want to help farm points, more than they want to actually win.
-First DLC is free!
-Once you are in, you are set for at least 10 minutes of play time.
-4 diffrent themed maps, all with multiple set ups pending on the Hunter.
-4 hunters. 5 Survivors. All with there own chain of level ups on the "Blood Web".
-Very fun once you get into the thick of things.

The Bad
-VERY HARD for new players, lot of people are much bigger than you.
-No level up with your friends. It all has to be done in solo play. Good luck.
-Camping Hunters
-Bad team mates.
-Quiters. (Problem for teams, takes points away from hunters, and they get no penalty for it.)
-Dailys that you just can't finish.
-No in game chat for teams.
-No main Hosting server (Lag is bassed on the Hunter's connection to you.)
-Cheaters who use Map Bugs to kill you.
-New bug, game keeps hanging on loading screen.
-VERY bad optimization. It's been years on the market now, and even Friday the 13th runs better than this shit.
-The characters, my ass looks better, the popular named horror heroes and villians look nothing like themselves, so why put the names on them? And again, if it's this ugly why does it take so much to run this game?

In short. You are better off with any other popular horror based game. I even joined in again after years away, only to find the lobbys are dead! Do not bother playing unless you have friends to fill in all positions!
